name: imightthrow
description: Shows a visual indicator when a  function has the `throw` keyword inside of it. This extension cannot determine whether a function might throw any error, it'll only tell you whether a function might throw a **manual** error.

imightthrow.decoration.description: The decoration to show next to functions that might throw. You can use any string, including emojis.

imightthrow.highlightColor.description: Color of the decoration for functions that might throw.

imightthrow.showOnCalls.description: Whether to show decoration on function calls

imightthrow.showOnDeclarations.description: Whether to show decoration on function declarations

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
